bankVerksamhet

Interface Konto

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoneKonto, MaxiKonto, SparKonto

    public interface Konto
    Konto representerar ett bankkonto.
    Version:
    (a version number or a date)
    Author:
    (your name)
